item.title: RT by @internetofshit: obsessed with this story about how one of the biggest ever tech privacy violations in canada was by tim hortons, the doughnut/coffee store whose app tracked users even when closed to their homes and rival stores https://www.nytimes.com/2022/06/11/world/canada/tim-hortons-privacy-data.html

item.title:
